chapter.p: Grizzlies and People

extra textra read all about it.
And also cool is the fact that we don't need no damn DTD.
Since the Ice Age, man has feared the great denizens of the north. But why is that?
Horribleness

Grizzlies are so horrible, they are named Ursus horribilis. 'Nuff said?
And also cool is the fact that we don't need no damn DTD.
Largeness

Male grizzlies can average 900 pounds and 9 feet tall. That's a lot of bear to feed, and they don't mind a little human in the diet!
And also cool is the fact that we don't need no damn DTD.
chapter.note: Or anything else, for that matter.
chapter.p: Aggressiveness
Grizzlies are too large to escape danger by climbing trees; instead, they stand their ground.
All that being said, humans are still more dangerous than grizzly bears!
